Bullet - 2.88 (<https://github.com/bulletphysics/bullet3>)
CrashRpt - 1.4.3 r1645
DirectX - Microsoft DirectX SDK (June 2010)

FMod - 4.44.61
JSON for Modern C++ - 3.4.0
SLikeNet - https://github.com/SLikeSoft/SLikeNet 11.09.2017
Visual Leak Detector - 2.5.1 (<https://kinddragon.github.io/vld/>)
zlib - 1.2.11 (<https://github.com/madler/zlib>)
